Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Update CHANGELOG.md to separate out beta changes" (#1508) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Update CHANGELOG.md to separate out beta changes" (#1508) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Closed pull request "Add feature to track calculation chain changes" (#1491) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This is an example of how we may be able to support calculation chain tracking. It does not handle all cases, nor set all values necessary for the calculation chain. It does, however, show how we can track additions or removals of formulas and react accordingly.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Discussion for v3.0.0" (#1270) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
We are going to address a number of technical issues that will require a major change. This version will not be binary compatible with the previous `2.x` versions, but should be source compatible to a degree. We will strive to maintain a migration guide and be aware of what effects changes will have.

This issue is to raise concerns about changes that may be made for discussion. Issues and PRs for this will be flagged using the [Milestone](https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/milestone/1)

CI builds for this will be pushed to a feed at: https://openxmlsdk.blob.core.windows.net/feed/index.json
